Reviews.Title: Don't buy from FOCUS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Doug & Kelly Roy
Reviews.Content: got this from focus camera... a third party seller. BEWARE OF FOCUS CAMERA.this camera worked for about 30 days then would not come on no matter what. Called Sony and their tech support and after 30 mins they said its defective and is a 1 year parts and labor and to send it back. Amazon sent me a rma in about 10 minuets and at my cost I sent it back to FOCUS CAMERA. who then promptly sent the defective camera back and said they don't take reterns or warranty items. Amazon also couldn't get them to do anything. So I am stuck over 200 in the hole. Will try now Sony direct again.  And to make matters worse FOCUS (CRAPPY) CAMERA now spams me abot 3 times a day to buy more of there sub par service crap.BE AWARE OF FOCUS CAMERA  no custermer support.........  RUN WAWAY FROM  FOCUS CAMERA

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, light weight, looks good, nice quality of pictures.
Reviews.Author: Martin Mousseau
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, light weight, looks good, nice quality of pictures. there's a good starting kit that is coming with the camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
SONY Cyber-shot DSCH200B Compact Zoom Digital Camera in Black
16GB Secure Digital Memory Card
Carrying Case
Mini Charger for AA Ni-Mh 2700mAh Batteries
Enhanced Lens Cleaning Kit
